entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 7 April 2023
